IMa vs. FIMBA observations
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): IMa vs. FIMBA observations
By bummerluck on Thursday, October 24, 2013 - 11:53 pm:

So a while back, when it seemed impossible to get the famed Akirel to appear in the IMa vs. FIMBA tourney, I got a little curious as to which other monsters appear throughout the tourney. I restarted and reloaded several times to check, and when Akirel finally stopped being a coward and faced my almost maxed out monster to get decimated in 30 seconds, I became even more curious as to how the entire tourney operates. So, the next few years (game time wise, jeez, it wasn't that time consuming to gather this info) I investigated the matter by entering different ranked monsters in the tourney.

Here is, what I believe, the full list of monsters that can possibly appear every time you enter the IMa vs. FIMBA tourney. Their total stats are next to their names.

S:

akirel 5014 gali/zuum (Holly's)
hammed 4814 hare/zuum (Holly's)
roog 4563 suezo/jell (Holly's)
abarel 3928 ghost (Holly's)
arngra 3248 hare/pixie
shing 3220 golem/tiger
soketsu 3187 monol/gali
lightning 3147 gali/suezo

A:

gora 3212 henger
lana 2817 worm/suezo
terrace 2761 plant
redondo 2712 dragon/golem (Holly's)
amy 2660 pixie
romulus 2612 henger (Holly's)
gardian 2394 monol (Holly's)
argu 2189 gali (Holly's)

B:

yuno 2346 pixie/tiger
gureb 2332 henger/zuum (Holly's)
riston 2281 hare
brild 2176 suezo/plant
kwan 2144 worm
suran 1787 jell/pixie (Holly's)
robek 1739 golem/gali (Holly's)
reno 1688 worm/pixie (Holly's)

C:

quarty 1800 suezo/pixie
makum 1644 suezo/worm
abiwan 1581 tiger/hare
goregon 1525 golem/suezo
entau 1491 jell (Holly's)
kitche 1329 pixie (Holly's)
boran 1252 zuum/golem (Holly's)
gong 1125 golem/zuum (Holly's)

D:

mopeto 1450 tiger/golem
tommy 1354 mew
michel 1352 suezo/hare
byoon 1303 tiger/zuum
jet 1123 tiger/naga (Holly's)
guran 1077 golem (Holly's)
scot 1052 suezo/hare (Holly's)
barura 1006 suezo/tiger (Holly's)

So, what does the "(Holly's)" next to *some* of the monsters' data indicate? Well, it is my belief that these are monsters that Holly actually own. Only one of the twenty can enter per tourney, and whether that monster is in the same grade as the monster you entered the tourney with or not, there's going to be a bit more back and forth between Holly and Colt.

If none of the monsters indicated as Holly's are in the FIMBA roster for the tournament, Holly still somehow makes conversation as if she's facing your monster with hers. But notice that she's notably absent afterwards.. because it was never her monster!

And a last note to make; Holly seems to concentrate all her efforts to raising all her S ranked monsters. Notice how the rest of her monsters in each grade are pretty much almost always the bottom feeders.

Anyway, not the most revolutionary or mind-blowing data, I think. But it's late at night and I may be drunk or something. So, excuse the ramble.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, October 25, 2013 - 10:46 pm:

Well, thanks! I;ll file this away in a few days.
